basics.name: Alex Taylor
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: Versatile software engineer with 8+ years of experience building full-stack web applications. Specialized in React, Node.js, and cloud services with a focus on creating scalable, user-centered solutions.

highlights: Led the development of a React-based dashboard that improved client engagement metrics by 37%
Architected and implemented a microservice-based API system using Node.js and AWS Lambda
Mentored junior developers through code reviews and pair programming sessions
Reduced page load times by 45% through code splitting and lazy loading techniques
Built responsive web applications using React and Redux that served 50K+ daily users
Implemented CI/CD pipelines that reduced deployment time by 60%
Collaborated with design team to create intuitive user interfaces and improve UX
Developed RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express connecting to MongoDB and PostgreSQL
Developed and maintained multiple client-facing web applications
Worked in an Agile team to deliver features on tight deadlines
Improved website performance by implementing modern JavaScript practices
Contributed to company's component library used across multiple projects

projects.name: DataVis Platform
projects.description: Open-source data visualization platform with customizable charts and dashboards
highlights: Built with React and D3.js with a Node.js backend
Featured on Product Hunt with 500+ upvotes
Implemented dynamic theming and responsive layouts

projects.name: CloudNotes
projects.description: Productivity app for collaborative note-taking with real-time updates
highlights: Utilized Firebase Real-time Database for syncing
Implemented markdown support and rich text editing
Added offline capabilities with service workers
